review_blob: Dark brown in color with tan head.  Tastes and smells of chocolate and coffee, without being overly sweet.  The head and overall palate was a bit thinner than expected.

A cloudy orange in color, maybe slightly darker than the other hefeweiss beers Ive had.  The aroma is strong in yeast and citric characteristics.  The taste is slightly sweet,  but more complex than many varieties. Overall, this was a great pick.

The appearance is characteristic of a weiss beer, a cloudy golden color with medium head. It has a sweet, yet somewhat citric taste and tha palate is fairly thick.  A decent American wheat, but not as good as the German hefeweizens Ive tried.

beer_brewer_name: Leinenkugel Brewing Company (Tenth & Blake Beer Co.)
review_blob: Pale yellow in color with a pleasant aroma.  Very thin head and a light body.  The taste is pretty mild and a little sweet.  Overall, an okay beer for the summer months.
